xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: A module for accessing a global cache for stored/shared data between sessions

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: cache:put
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: cache:put($cache-value as item(), $key as xs:anyType+, $value as xs:anyType*) as xs:anyType*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Put data with a key into the identified cache. Returns the previous value associated with the key
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $cache-value Either the Java cache object or the name of the cache
$key+ The key to the object within the cache
$value* The object to store within the cache
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:anyType* : the previous value associated with the key

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: cache:get
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: cache:get($cache-identity as item(), $key as xs:anyType+) as xs:anyType*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Get data from identified global cache by key
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $cache-identity Either the Java cache object or the name of the cache
$key+ The key to the object within the cache
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:anyType* : the value that is associated with the key

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Get/create a cache using the specified name.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $name The name of the cache to get/create
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: object : the Java cache object with the given name.

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $cache-value Either the Java cache object or the name of the cache

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: cache:remove
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: cache:remove($cache-value as item(), $key as xs:anyType+) as xs:anyType*

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Remove data from the identified cache by the key. Returns the value that was associated with key
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $cache-value Either the Java cache object or the name of the cache
$key+ The key to the object within the cache
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: xs:anyType* : the value that was associated with the key

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: List all keys stored in the global cache
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $cache-identity Either the Java cache object or the name of the cache
